IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package trajectories :: Module rigid_body

Module rigid_body

source code

Modelling of rigid body models for motion trajectory generation.

Rigid body models are composed of a tree of Joint objects. Each Joint has an offset from its parent, specified in the parents local co-ordinate frame. The position of any part of the body model can be calculated using forward kinematics, given the position of the root joint of the body model and the rotation of each of the joints.

The rotation of joints is given by a RotationTrajectory specifying the rotation of the joint local co-ordinate frame relative to the global co-ordinate frame at any point in time. The position of the root joint of the body model is specified by a PositionTrajectory.

Classes
  Point
A point in a rigid body model.
  Joint
A joint in a rigid body model, with its own rotating co-ordinate frame.
  PointTrajectory
Trajectory followed by a point in a rigid body model.
  SampledJoint
A joint in a rigid body model with sampled rotations.
  SampledBodyModel
A body model with sampled positions and rotations.
  SplinedJoint
A joint with rotations splined from sampled data.
  SplinedBodyModel
A body model with positions and rotations splined from sampled data.
Variables
  __package__ = 'imusim.trajectories'
